content: anyone have any ideas why the ig publisher would get stuck on "Processing conformance resources". I ran the ig publisher successfully on my resources a number of times already, and the only thing I changed was binding references to value sets... The reference was incorrect, and I fixed the reference. Why would a good reference freeze the ig publisher, but not a bad reference?
nevermind... I think I figured it out. was referencing base spec value sets as "ValueSet/XXX" rather than their full identifier
Hanging isn't a good thing in any case. If you can reproduce the issue, feel free to submit a snapshot of the IG that breaks things attached to a change request
